newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Soy firms, corn and wheat steady.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Soy firms, corn and wheat steady.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf soybean offers rose one cent a bushel on Friday following a sharp drop in Chicago Board of Trade soybean futures, while corn and wheat values remained unchanged, dealers said.

But transportation problems on the upper Mississippi continued to be a background factor. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers said it closed Lock and Dam 6 near Trempealeau, Wis., on the upper Mississippi River due to high water.
"That lock closed early this morning," said Ken Gardner, the Corps' public affairs officer in St Paul, Minn.
So far, nine locks have been closed from upper and lower St Anthony Falls, Minn., southward to Lock and Dam 6 at Trempealeau, Corps officials said.
The U.S. Coast Guard said it did not plan to expand the approximate 240-mile safety zone it has imposed on the upper Mississippi this week but was closely watching the high water levels in that area.
"We have not expanded the zone," said Lt. Drew Cheney, assistant Chief of Port Operations, Coast Guard Marine Safety Office, St Louis.
High waters and potential flooding prompted the Coast Guard to close navigation from River Mile 615.1 at Guttenberg, Iowa, to River Mile 857.6 at Minneapolis, Minn., late Wednesday.
CORN (No. 3 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
April LH unq + K nc +22.5 + K unc
May 1-20 unq + K nc +22 + K unc
June unq + N nc +22 + N unc
July unq + N nc +22 + N unc
Note: K=CBOT May, N=CBOT July, nc=no comparison.
SOYBEANS (No. 2 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu)
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
April LH unq + K nc +26 + K up 1
FH May unq + K nc +26 + K up 1
LH May unq + K nc +27 + K up 1
June FH unq + N nc +26 + N up 1
June LH unq + N nc +27 + N up 1
July unq + N nc +28 + N up 1
Note K=CBOT May, N=CBOT July, nc=no comparison
SRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
April unq nc +32 + K unc
May unq nc +28 + K unc
June unq nc +25 + N unc
July unq nc +14 + N unc
HRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis KCBT, cts/bu) -
April unq nc +60 + K unc
June unq nc +48 + N unc
LH June unq nc +45 + N unc
July unq nc +42 + N unc
Note: K=May futures. N=July futures.
((Chicago newsdesk 312-408-8720))
